name: Heritage Vinyl Blue Port Hole 12' x 36" Liner

reviews.name: Heritage Vinyl Blue Port Hole 12' x 36" Liner
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this liner to replace my old liner and although I was a little worried after reading some of the other reviews, I had no problems with this liner as a matter of fact this liner went on better then the liner that first came with my pool. This liner was a little thinner then what I had before, but after shopping ALL over the web it was the best price.
reviews.title: Not Bad !!!!

reviews.name: Heritage Vinyl Blue Port Hole 12' x 36" Liner
reviews.reviewText: Never send me the right item. I make the order two times And the second time no only was the wrong size also don't had the port hole.
reviews.title: Wrong Size

reviews.name: Heritage Vinyl Blue Port Hole 12' x 36" Liner
reviews.reviewText:
The pool liner, was baught as second replacement.
The original liner with pool lasted 3 years.
The second liner also from Walmart, looked near same as original, but the liner became crumbly in areas over the winter, had to be thrown away.
This third liner, I was forced to by at walmart too, as I could not find a replacement any where else, at reasonable price.
It was slightly to small, it is verry thin, has no drain hole, and did not come with the coping strip to hold liner in place.
I had to realy stretch the liner, to get it to go over the rim of the pool, using lots of cloths line pins to hold it in place.
I came up with idea of using the vacuum hand tool, placed in the empty waterlet hole of outer shell, to suck the liner tight to ground and sidewalls of the pool.
I could not find the top coping anywhere, so I used a huge box of small binder clips, to hold the liner in place.
And used small diameter inslated slitted pip covering, over the top rim of the pool, hiding all those steel clips.
reviews.title: Left overs

reviews.name: Heritage Vinyl Blue Port Hole 12' x 36" Liner
reviews.reviewText: The liner worked well for us. I am actually ordering another one. Our pool gets used daily but does not get heavy use, if that makes sense. This liner has worked well for us.
reviews.title: did what it is supposed to!

reviews.name: Heritage Vinyl Blue Port Hole 12' x 36" Liner
reviews.reviewText: the liner was everything i expected. when i bought the pool i thought it would be fairly simple to put up. It was a disaster. Somehow we got it up. We are totally unsatisfied with the pool.
reviews.title: good liner/bad pool
